bibl.title: Agriculture in Egypt from Pharaonic to Modern Times.
bibl.note: 18 papers, presented, with one exception, at a British Academy Symposium entitled 'Land, Settlement and Agriculture in Egypt from Pharaonic to Modern Times', which took place at Oxford in March 1996. - Pp. xi-xii: Alan K. BOWMAN and Eugene ROGAN, Preface; - 405-427: Index.
bibl.seg: BOWMAN Alan K. and Eugene ROGAN (Edd.), Agriculture in Egypt from Pharaonic to Modern Times. (Proceedings of the British Academy. 96.)
Oxford, Oxford University Press, 1999, xxviii-427 pp., tabl., cartes, plans. ISBN 0-19-726183-3. Â£40.

18 papers, presented, with one exception, at a British Academy Symposium entitled 'Land, Settlement and Agriculture in Egypt from Pharaonic to Modern Times', which took place at Oxford in March 1996. - Pp. xi-xii: Alan K. BOWMAN and Eugene ROGAN, Preface; - 405-427: Index.
C.R. par Roger S. Bagnall, JRA 13 (2000) pp. 707-711.
